definition: of an achromatic color of any lightness intermediate between the extremes of white and black, horse of a light gray or whitish color, to turn grey
details:
adjective
- of an achromatic color of any lightness intermediate between the extremes of white and black
= example: of an achromatic color of any lightness intermediate between the extremes of white and black
= synonyms: gray, greyish, grayish
- intermediate in character or position
= example: intermediate in character or position
= synonyms: gray
- used to signify the Confederate forces in the American Civil War (who wore grey uniforms)
= example: used to signify the Confederate forces in the American Civil War (who wore grey uniforms)
= synonyms: gray
- showing characteristics of age, especially having grey or white hair
= synonyms: hoary
noun
- horse of a light gray or whitish color
= synonyms: gray
- clothing that is a grey color
= example: clothing that is a grey color
= synonyms: gray
- a neutral achromatic color midway between white and black
= synonyms: gray, grayness, greyness
- any organization or party whose uniforms or badges are grey
= example: any organization or party whose uniforms or badges are grey
= synonyms: gray
verb
- to turn grey
= example: to turn grey
= synonyms: gray
- make grey
= example: make grey
= synonyms: gray
